1430980.name: Space Love Delta
1430980.description:
When Major Tom is kidnapped, it’s up to you and the crew to infiltrate a mysterious and ancient alien complex in order to rescue him.

The road is filled with puzzles and death traps, but with the help of your beautiful allies, you’ll be able to overcome any challenge!

Different endings depending on your choices.
4 beautiful companions to choose from.
Deadly traps and puzzle elements.
More than 24 illustrated scenes.
4 different endings.
Visual novel set in a sci fi environment. The story is completely different depending on which companion you choose, so you should play again to see the whole story!
